name: Honey

sources.source: Gained by a level 1 Beetle at the start of battle.

effect: Summon one 1/1 Bee after fainting.

name: Strawberry
effect: Enables Strawberry abilities.

name: Blueberry
effect: Prioritize this for enemy random abilities.

name: Egg

sources.source: Nests summoned by a Robin have an innate Egg.

effect: Deal 2 damage before attacking, once.

name: Meat_Bone

sources.source: Gained by a level 2 Beetle at the start of battle.

effect: Attack with +3 damage.

name: Rice

sources.source: Dolphins summoned by a Beluga Sturgeon have innate Rice.

effect: Sell for +2 gold.

name: Cherry
effect: Gain 2 Trumpet on faint.

name: Chocolate_Cake
effect: Gain +3 experience and faint before attacking.

name: Garlic

sources.source: Gained by a level 3 Beetle at the start of battle.
Given to friends by the Garlic Press Toy (which can be gained from a Lemur on buy).

effect: Take 2 less damage.

name: Croissant
effect: Gain +1 attack at end of turn.

name: Cucumber
effect: Gain +1 health at end of turn.

name: Pineapple
effect: Ability deals 2 more damage.

name: Eggplant
effect: Push opposite enemy 1 space forward on start of battle.

name: Pie
effect: Gain +4 attack before start of battle.

name: Salt
effect: Attack lower tier pets for double damage.

name: Cheese
effect: Attack with double damage, once.

name: Grapes
effect: Gain +1 gold at the start of every turn.

name: Donut
effect: Prioritize this for friendly random abilities.

name: Fortune_Cookie
effect: Attack has 50% chance to deal double damage.

name: Banana
effect: Summon one 4/4 Monkey on faint.

name: Potato
effect: Take 10 less damage from abilities, twice.

name: Chili

sources.source: Buses summoned by a Deer have innate Chili.

effect: Attack second enemy for 5 damage.

name: Lemon
effect: Take 7 less damage, twice (Cant reduce damage below 1).

name: Carrot
effect: Gain +1 attack at the end of turn.

name: Pepper
effect: Health does not go under 1. Removed after taking damage.

name: Onion
effect: Move to back when in the front, once.

name: Melon

sources.source: Gained by Ox when the friend ahead faints.
Given by Crane when the friend ahead is hurt.
Given by the Melon Helmet Toy (which can be gained from a Gharial on buy)..

effect: Take 20 less damage, once.

name: Mushroom
effect: Come back as a 1/1 after fainting.

name: Steak
effect: Attack with +20 damage, once.

name: Pancakes
effect: Give friend +2 attack before start of battle.

name: Popcorn
effect: Summon a random pet from the same tier after fainting.

name: Pita_Bread
effect: Gain +15 health when hurt, once.

name: Tomato
effect: Deal 8 damage to the last enemy before attacking, once.

name: Peanut

sources.source: Given to friends by the Peanut Jar Toy (which can be gained from a Mongoose on buy).

effect: Knock out any pet attacked and hurt by this.

name: Coconut

sources.source: Wildebeest before attack if it can spend 4 trumpets.
Doberman at the start of battle if it's the lowest tier friend.
Given to Strawberry friends by Velociraptor.
Given to enemies by the Action Figure Toy in Hard Mode.
Given to friends by the Air Palm Tree Toy (which can be gained from a Mongoose on buy).

effect: Ignore damage once

name: Skewer

sources.source: Given by Snapping Turtle upon faint.

effect: Attack second and third enemy for 3 Damage

name: Apple

sources.source: A level 1 Mouse will stock a free Apple upon being sold.
A level 1 Worm will stock a 2 gold Apple at start of turn.

effect: Give one pet +1 attack and +1 health.

name: Better_Apple

sources.source: A level 2 Mouse will stock a free Apple upon being sold.
A level 2 Worm will stock a 2 gold Apple at start of turn.

effect: Give one pet +2 attack and +2 health.

name: Best_Apple

sources.source: A level 3 Mouse will stock a free Apple upon being sold.
A level 3 Worm will stock a 2 gold Apple at start of turn.

effect: Give one pet +3 attack and +3 health.

name: Peach
effect: Give one pet +2 health.

name: Bacon
effect: Give one pet +2 attack.

name: Cookie
effect: Give one pet +2 attack and +2 health until end of battle.

name: Cupcake
effect: Give one pet +3 attack and +3 health until end of battle.

name: Sleeping_Pill
effect: Make one pet faint. Always on sale!

name: Broccoli
effect: Give one pet -1 attack and +3 health.

name: Fried_Shrimp
effect: Give one pet +3 attack and -1 health.

name: Salad_Bowl
effect: Give 2 random pets +1 attack and +1 health.

name: Lollipop
effect: Swap attack and health of a pet.

name: Avocado
effect: Gain +3 gold on the next turn.

name: Lettuce
effect: Give three pets from the current shop tier or higher +1 attack and +1 health.

name: Canned_Food
effect: Give all current and future shop pets +1 attack and +1 health.

name: Pear
effect: Give one pet +2 attack and +2 health.

name: Salt
effect: Give one pet the Salt Perk. Attack lower tier pets for double damage.

name: Waffle
effect: Activate buy ability.

name: Chocolate

sources.source: A level 1 Crow will stock Chocolate upon being sold.

effect: Give one pet +1 Experience.

name: Better_Chocolate

sources.source: A level 2 Crow will stock Chocolate upon being sold.

effect: Give one pet +2 Experience.

name: Best_Chocolate

sources.source: A level 3 Crow will stock Chocolate upon being sold.

effect: Give one pet +3 Experience.

name: Sushi
effect: Give three random pets +1 attack and +1 health.

name: Lasagna
effect: Give one pet +2 attack and +3 health.

name: Stew
effect: Give three random pets +2 health.

name: Taco
effect: Give three random pets +2 attack.

name: Pizza
effect: Give two random pets +2 attack and +2 health.

name: Hot_Dog
effect: Give two random pets +4 attack.

name: Orange
effect: Give two random pets +4 health.

name: Chicken_Leg
effect: Give one pet +3 attack and +3 health.

name: Soft_Ice
effect: Give all pets +1 attack.

name: Pretzel
effect: Give one pet +2 attack and +2 health. Double if all pets are tier 4 or higher.

name: Milk

sources.source: Can only obtained by buying a Cow.

effect: Give one pet +1 attack and +2 health.

name: Better_Milk

sources.source: Can only obtained by leveling up a Cow to level 2.

effect: Give one pet +2 attack and +4 health.

name: Best_Milk

sources.source: Can only obtained by leveling up a Cow to level 3.

effect: Give one pet +3 attack and +6 health.
